content.rendered:
The University of La Verne understands the needs of the military connected students; for more than 45 years, we have helped active duty, veterans, and their spouses, dependents and survivors achieve their educational goals on campus, on base, or online.

Whether you are preparing for promotion or transitioning to civilian life, La Verne is there to see you succeed.

 

  • Apply Today
  • Request Information
  • Information Sessions

 

Survivors, Spouses and Dependents Education Assistance and Services

The University of La Verne is proud to support the individuals who support our Active Duty and Veterans.

Read More
Active Duty Service Members

Whether at the central campus, a regional campus location, online, or a military base, the University is proud to support our active duty service members.

Learn More
Veteran Resources and Success

The Sara and Michael Abraham Center for Veteran Student Success serves as an advocate, and a liaison to services, resources and programs on behalf of veterans, active duty service members, and military-connected students.

Explore Services

Available Programs

  • General Studies, AA
  • Accounting, BA
  • Art History, BA
  • Business Administration, BA
  • Chemistry, BA

  • Teaching, MA

  • Business Administration, MBA
  • Educational Leadership, EdD

  • Health Administration, MHA

  • Doctor of Business Administration, DBA
  • Doctor of Public Administration, DPA
  • Doctor of Education Organizational Leadership, EdD
  • Doctor of Psychology – in Clinical Psychology, PsyD

 

Certificate and Credential Programs

  • Extensive Support Needs Education Specialist Credential, CRED 
  • Mild to Moderate Education Specialist Credential, CRED 
  • Multiple Subject Teaching Credential, CRED 
  • Preliminary Administrative Services Credential, CRED 
  • Single Subject Teaching Credential, CRED

  • Cyber Security Certificate, CERT
  • Human Resource Management Certificate, CERT

  • Systems Engineering Certificate, CERT
  • Website and Internet Development Certificate, CERT
